name: Bubblemania GB
description:
BubbleMania GB is a simplistic arcade game released for the Game Boy,   second place winner of the  RetroAcción  contest on 2019.

Foreign animals  are  comming  to Your island , You are Mr Bubbles (yes an ape).  Defeat  them with your bubble powers and remember :

 apes don't know how to swin!

How to play: 

  • Jump and float  in the air and don't touch the water.
  • Avoid and shoot bubbles to your enemies to defeat them.
  • Try to get the highest score:    

               Bird  100 points.                       

               Fliying fish  200 points.        

               Starfish  300 points .              

Controls 

  • A:  Jump/ Float
  • B:  Shoot bubbles

Credits: Code, Graphics and Design: Leo Rodriguez @oldrobotto

The game was designed to run on real hardware but works fine on most accurate emulators. I suggest using the BGB emulator if you're using a Windows PC.
